word:
(1902) 7T 134  
     466. It would be well for us to do less cooking and to eat more fruit in its natural state. Let us teach the people to eat freely of the fresh grapes, apples, peaches, pears, berries, and all other kinds of fruit that can be obtained. Let these be prepared for winter use by canning, using glass, as far as possible, instead of tin. 
     [FRUIT IS EXCELLENT FOOD, SAVES MUCH COOKING--546]
